resources.string: Quest moved to Inbox. -%1$d XP -%2$d coins.
Sure you want to delete this awesome quest?
Would you like to remove all quests for the challenge as well?
Encourage us by rating iPoli on Google Play?
Calendar is the place where you can control your daily schedule.
Above the calendar is the area with your unscheduled quests for the day.
In grey you can see where iPoli recommends to schedule them.
Touch, hold and drag quest to schedule it
Repeating Quests are called all your repeating tasks.
iPoli automatically makes a quest in your calendar for the repeating one if you have to do it on a particular date.
From this screen you can track your weekly progress.
This is the place with all your unscheduled quests.
If you don\'t complete a quest during the day it will automatically move to your Inbox.
Use the overview to manage your uncompleted quests for the next 7 days.
Challenges are your short and long-term goals.
Use them to clearly define what you want, why you want it and by what date you will achieve it.
Divide your epic challenges into smaller tasks by assigning (repeating) quests to a challenge. Gain additional XP and coins when you complete a quest from a challenge!
Reward can be anything. For example: \'Eat a chocolate\' or \'Go on a vacation\'.
You choose how much it costs depending on your efforts.
Sure you want to delete this awesome reward?
Too expensive. Go complete some quests!
Good job! You are now at level %d! Keep up the good work!
What a shame! No rewards here! Add one?
Your adventure is empty! Start it by adding a quest?
No repeating quests? Add repeating task or habit?
The time spent chart shows you which quest contexts take most of your time
The experience chart shows you how much XP you gain per day
You must add name for your reward
Why do you want this reward?
Add your challenges and conquer them!
When the day is over, what 3 quests will you want to have conquered?
Most important quests for today saved
Every morning, choose your 3 most important quests for the day.
By defining and prioritising your tasks you are much more likely to complete them.
Most important quests will be marked with star in your calendar and journey
You can adjust challenge days and reminder time in Settings
What results do you expect to achieve?
Why do you want to do it?
Add at least 1 expected result to motivate yourself
Add at least 1 reason to know why you are doing this
Use the timer to track how you spend your time
Create and manage checklist for your quest
Check how you are doing with your repeating quest
How much time you\'ve spent on this quest
Streak counter. The higher your streak, the more XP and coins you will receive when completing the quest.
Check your progress and how you are doing with your challenge.
Track how many quests you\'ve completed and how many remain.
How much time you\'ve spent on this challenge
When is the next quest for the challenge
List of remaining quests. Add more or swipe left to remove one.
Long tap on any free time slot to use quick add
Start your day with a smile
Not enough coins to buy this pet
This is your personal pet who will help you in your journey!
Keep him healthy by adding and completing quests and challenges. Healthier the pet, the bigger bonuses you get.
Go to the pet shop if you want to buy and replace this pet. You can have only one at a time.
If you want some coins, you should enable your internet!

Oh no, you have to wait!\niPoli is eating a biscuit and upgrading your experience
This app really boosts my productivity and helps me stay organized. I am sure you will like it too!

Disabling Google calendar sync will delete all your not completed quests from Google calendars. Are you sure?
No quests for this date. Why not add some?
iPoli needs to read your calendars to import your events as quests
iPoli needs to read your calendars to import your events as quests. You can disable it from Settings.

Unfortunately, you don\'t have enough coins to enable this power-up. Become premium member to enable all power-ups at once!
Not enough coins to buy avatar
Select a category to view more data
You can now enjoy %s for a month
Press the button to buy your reward. If the button is grey, work a little bit harder to earn these coins!
Define your own rewards and buy them when you win enough coins by completing your quests.
Plan and achieve your short and long-term goals
Challenges help you plan and achieve your life goals. Create challenges for all your short and long-term goals. Then you can track your progress and stay motivated.
Track and compare your progress and productivity during different time spans.
Monitor home much time do you spend for quests in each category, how many do you complete, what is your Awesomeness score and more facts to help your productivity.
Prioritize your tasks and focus on important ones
The Eisenhower matrix divides your quests into 4 groups depending on their priority. It helps you focus on the most important tasks.
Import and sync events and tasks from your other calendars
Keep iPoli up to date by syncing events and tasks from your calendars. Assign different category for each calendar (work, personal, …)
Challenge yourself with special programs to be more healthy, skillful and happy

We\'ve prepared special challenges for you to be healthy, fit, to learn new skills and spend more time with your family. The programs are easy to follow but you can always adjust them according to your needs.
Stay organized and clear your mind
Stay organized by adding notes to your quests
Add simple notes to your quests to help you remember important information.
Manage and track your time even more effectively
Don\'t know where your time flies? Monitor it by tracking your quests duration or use it as a timer for your Pomodoros, fitness activities or cooking recipes.
Be more productive by dividing your tasks into smaller pieces. Define steps, subtasks or even create shopping lists.
Let iPoli remind you when it\'s time for the next quest
Add reminders to your quests. No need to look at your phone or watch all the time, focus on the current task and iPoli will notify you when the next one comes.
Choose the best duration for your quests
Not satisfied with provided options for quests duration? You can now define your own duration spans.
Choose your own time intervals for quests. The minimum value is 10 minutes. The maximum is still 4 hours. If you need longer value, then try to divide your quest into shorter quests.
Do you want to enable it now for %d of your life coins for a month?
Then what are you doing here!?
Come on! I believe in you!
Gosh, we have another one of those…
Are you ready to embrace your destiny of studying many hours, working late, doing sports and eating yucky food?
So, we\'ve established the fact that you might be the ONE. Would you like some tips?
Many millennia ago, a daemon from another dimension came to conquer us. Yes, he used backdoor that was left intentionally open!
His objective? Eat all the ice-cream on Earth! And kill the ONE!

Counterintuitively enough, only the ONE can stop him! Let\'s hope that\'s you! That daemon I was telling you about is pretty evil! He is so evil that his name is EVIL Snail! Yes, that name was given to him by his mother
Your greatest journey is starting today!
First, let\'s get to know you a bit better. How should I call you?
%s, let\'s achieve your life goals by fighting procrastination, laziness and clutter together!
Your quest has been added to your calendar. Complete it by tapping on the checkbox.
Every time you complete a quest you get a reward! Experience allows you to level up and with life coins you can enable power-ups, buy new avatars ot pets.
You can follow your progress here. These are your avatar and pet. Keep your pet happy by completing your quests regularly to achieve maximum coins and XP bonus!
Use your hard earned coins to enable powerful power-ups (Challenges, Calendar sync, Notes etc) or buy new avatars and cute pets!
Do you see the button below? Will you do me the honor?
Enter the name of your first quest
Your tasks are now called quests. Let\'s start by adding your first one!
Do you want me to show you how we will fight your life enemies together?
Quests can\'t be longer than 4 hours
Quests can\'t be shorter than 10 minutes

Please, sign in to follow players
Use only english letters, digits and underscore
